virtual int wxSQLite3Collation::Compare (  const wxString &  text1,
const wxString &  text2
)  [inline, virtual]
 

Execute a comparison using a user-defined collation sequence.

Please refer to the SQLite documentation for further information.

Parameters:
text1 first text string
text2 second text string
Returns:
an integer < 0, = 0, or > 0 depending on whether text1 is less than, equal to, or greater than text2.
